body:
### Problem

```
FAILED   test/functional/terminal/tui_spec.lua @ 2505: TUI has no black flicker when clearing regions during startup with termguicolors
test/functional/terminal/tui_spec.lua:2528: Row 1 did not match.
Expected:
  |*^                                                   |
  |*                                                   |
  |*                                                   |
  |*                                                   |
  |*                                                   |
  |*                                                   |
  |*                                                   |
  |*                                                   |
  |*                                                   |
  |*                                                   |
  |                                                   |
Actual:
  |*{UNEXPECTED foreground = Screen.colors.NvimDarkGray2, background = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey2:^                                                   }|
  |*{UNEXPECTED foreground = Screen.colors.NvimLightGray4, background = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey2:~                                                  }|
  |*{UNEXPECTED foreground = Screen.colors.NvimLightGray4, background = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey2:~                                                  }|
  |*{UNEXPECTED foreground = Screen.colors.NvimLightGray4, background = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey2:~                                                  }|
  |*{UNEXPECTED foreground = Screen.colors.NvimLightGray4, background = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey2:~                                                  }|
  |*{UNEXPECTED foreground = Screen.colors.NvimLightGray4, background = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey2:~                                                  }|
  |*{UNEXPECTED foreground = Screen.colors.NvimLightGray4, background = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey2:~                                                  }|
  |*{UNEXPECTED foreground = Screen.colors.NvimLightGray4, background = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey2:~                                                  }|
  |*{UNEXPECTED foreground = Screen.colors.NvimLightGray3, background = Screen.colors.NvimDarkGrey3:[No Name]                        0,0-1          All}|
  |*{UNEXPECTED foreground = Screen.colors.NvimDarkGray2, background = Screen.colors.NvimLightGrey2:                                                   }|
  |          
```

### Expected behavior

@luukvbaal this test fails quite often, does it indicate that the bug is still present? maybe we should set it to `pending()` ?

comment_data.body:
#28667 is still functionally solved in my testing. IDK what this failure means, I cannot reproduce it even with `stress -c 100& while TEST_FILE=test/functional/terminal/tui_spec.lua TEST_FILTER=black make functionaltest; do echo; done; pkill stress`. That does sporadically result in ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

```
Actual:
  |^                                                   |
  |                                                   |
  |                                                   |
  |                                                   |
  |                                                   |
  |                                                   |
  |                                                   |
  |*{UNEXPECTED background = Screen.colors.Gray0, foreground = Screen.colors.Gray0:                                                }|
  |*{UNEXPECTED background = Screen.colors.Gray0, foreground = Screen.colors.Gray0:                                                }|
  |                                                   |
  |                                                   |
```

Setting to `pending()` is fine but unless observable startup problems reoccur I won't look into this again so might as well remove it if it doesn't reliably test for what it solved.

title: unreliable test: tui_spec: "TUI has no black flicker"
